Title: Relates to review of certain contracts of a limited-profit housing company
Summary: Requires the commissioner of housing and community renewal, or the appropriate supervising agency, to review contracts for $50,000 or more entered into by a limited-profit housing company.
LawCode: Amd ยง32-a, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to review of certain contracts of limited-profit housing companies
